author: Aaron Weaver
title: Chris Cuomo Details Coronavirus Struggle – And It Sounds Terrifying
description: Chris Cuomo detailed his battle with COVID-19 and it sounds brutal. Other public figures have come out with equally chilling descriptions that should scare all of us into staying home whenever possible. The post Chris Cuomo Details Coronavirus Struggle – And …
content:
• Journalist Chris Cuomo recently went into detail about his battles with COVID-19.
  • His descriptions are frightening, to say the least.
